name: Change Inpatient to Outpatient
description: Status change notification when a patient's visit type changes from inpatient to outpatient
businessPurpose: Notify receiving systems when a patient's status changes from inpatient to outpatient, typically releasing bed assignment
timing: Sent when inpatient status converts to outpatient, often for observation or continued care
realWorldScenarios: Patient stable enough for outpatient monitoring
Post-surgery patient moved to outpatient recovery
Extended care converted to outpatient visits
Rehabilitation transition from inpatient to outpatient

generationRules.PV1.3: Location change from inpatient bed to outpatient area
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - status change affects billing methodology and bed availability
